metadata.summary: Configure LimaCharlie to stream events and detections to Google Cloud Pubsub topics for real-time processing
metadata.primary_use_case: Stream LimaCharlie telemetry to Google Cloud Pubsub for real-time event processing and analytics pipelines

extracted_apis.description: Output events and detections to a Google Cloud Pubsub topic for real-time streaming

cross_refs.description: Related Google Cloud output destination using GCS for batch storage instead of real-time streaming
